title: [Large-scale] Ontology Construction Workshop for Comparative Analysis of Instructional Design Theories

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational educational theories and experience using computers and smartphones
context.additional_context: Aimed at strengthening methodologies for systematically comparing science education theories. Modular learning conducted in 10-15 minute units in mobile environments

learning_goals: At least three instructional design theories can be comparatively analyzed using an ontology-building process.
Similar and differing concepts between theories can be categorized and visualized.
Core instructional design concepts applicable to the science field can be derived.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
